On this page

# Roo Code Features

Discover the powerful features that make Roo Code your ultimate AI-powered coding assistant. From intelligent code editing to advanced integrations, Roo Code enhances your development workflow.

## Core Features [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#core-features "Direct link to Core Features")

### Code Editing & Navigation [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#code-editing--navigation "Direct link to Code Editing & Navigation")

- [**Fast Edits**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/fast-edits) \- Lightning-fast code modifications with intelligent diff application
- [**Concurrent File Reads**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/concurrent-file-reads) \- Read multiple files simultaneously for better context
- [**Code Actions**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/code-actions) \- Quick fixes and refactoring suggestions
- [**Diagnostics Integration**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/diagnostics-integration) \- Real-time error detection and resolution

### AI Enhancements [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#ai-enhancements "Direct link to AI Enhancements")

- [**Codebase Indexing**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/codebase-indexing) \- Semantic search across your entire codebase
- [**Enhance Prompt**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/enhance-prompt) \- Automatically improve your prompts for better results
- [**Suggested Responses**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/suggested-responses) \- Context-aware follow-up suggestions
- [**Model Temperature**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/model-temperature) \- Fine-tune AI creativity and consistency

### Workflow Management [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#workflow-management "Direct link to Workflow Management")

- [**Task Todo List**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/task-todo-list) \- Track progress on complex multi-step tasks
- [**Checkpoints**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/checkpoints) \- Save and restore conversation states
- [**Boomerang Tasks**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/boomerang-tasks) \- Reusable task templates
- [**Custom Modes**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/custom-modes) \- Create specialized AI assistants for specific workflows

### Configuration & Customization [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#configuration--customization "Direct link to Configuration & Customization")

- [**API Configuration Profiles**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/api-configuration-profiles) \- Manage multiple API configurations
- [**Custom Instructions**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/custom-instructions) \- Personalize AI behavior
- [**Settings Management**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/settings-management) \- Fine-tune Roo Code to your preferences
- [**.rooignore**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/rooignore) \- Control file access and visibility

### Integration Features [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#integration-features "Direct link to Integration Features")

- [**MCP (Model Context Protocol)**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/mcp/overview) \- Connect to external tools and services
- [**Browser Use**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/browser-use) \- Web automation and interaction capabilities
- [**Shell Integration**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/shell-integration) \- Seamless terminal command execution
- [**Marketplace**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/marketplace) \- Discover and share custom modes

### Productivity Tools [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#productivity-tools "Direct link to Productivity Tools")

- [**Auto-Approving Actions**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/auto-approving-actions) \- Streamline repetitive approvals
- [**Keyboard Shortcuts**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/keyboard-shortcuts) \- Speed up common actions
- [**Intelligent Context Condensing**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/intelligent-context-condensing) \- Optimize token usage

## Experimental Features [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#experimental-features "Direct link to Experimental Features")

Push the boundaries with cutting-edge capabilities:

- [**Concurrent File Edits**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/experimental/concurrent-file-edits) \- Edit multiple files in a single operation
- [**Power Steering**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/experimental/power-steering) \- Enhanced consistency in AI responses
- [**More Experimental Features**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/experimental/experimental-features) \- Explore features under development

## Additional Resources [​](https://docs.roocode.com/features/\#additional-resources "Direct link to Additional Resources")

- [**More Features**](https://docs.roocode.com/features/more-features) \- Discover additional capabilities
- [**Tips & Tricks**](https://docs.roocode.com/tips-and-tricks) \- Get the most out of Roo Code
- [**FAQ**](https://docs.roocode.com/faq) \- Common questions answered

* * *

Ready to explore? Start with our [Getting Started Guide](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing) or dive into any feature that interests you!

[Edit this page](https://github.com/RooCodeInc/Roo-Code-Docs/edit/main/docs/features/index.md)
